main.name: andi
main.description:
currently studying computer science and art/visual technology at george mason university.
this is my personal website where you can learn more about me and explore some of my creations
main.bio: I have 4+ years of experience with back end development, and I am currently expanding on my skills in full-stack development and machine learning. I enjoy anything that allows me to exercise my creativity- from music to art to programming!

work.title: pragmatics, inc.
work.description: developed the back end for a forum web application that performs automatic tagging - created microservices using a rest api and integrated apache kafka to optimize data flows - built using spring boot, deployed with docker

work.title: george mason university
work.description: assist in labs for cs 211 (java) and cs 262 (c) - provide guidance for 300+ students to resolve issues with their work through piazza.

work.company: sales associate and instrument repair assistant
work.title: day violins, llc
